GPT-4o-audio: Presumed variant of GPT-4o by OpenAI, likely focused on audio processing, but no specific public release exists; possibly a future or internal model for real-time audio tasks.
GPT-4o: OpenAI's multimodal model released in May 2024, designed for fast, versatile performance across text, images, and other data, with a 128K token context length.
GPT-o1: OpenAI's reasoning-focused model launched in September 2024, optimized for complex problem-solving like math and coding, with enhanced step-by-step logic.
GPT-o3-mini: No official release exists; likely a speculative or future smaller variant of an 'o3' model, possibly aimed at efficient reasoning tasks.
Gemini-2.0-flash-lite: No distinct public model; possibly a misnomer or unreleased lightweight version of Gemini 2.0 Flash, intended for low-latency, cost-effective tasks.
Gemini-2.0-flash: Google's efficient model released in December 2024, built for low-latency agentic tasks with a 1M token context length, excelling in speed and cost.
Gemini-1.5-flash: Google's fast, lightweight model from May 2024, with a 1M token context length, designed for quick responses in real-time applications.
Gemini-1.5-pro: Google's advanced model from May 2024, with a 2M token context length, optimized for complex multimodal tasks and enterprise use.
Claude-3.5-sonnet: Anthropic's mid-tier model updated in October 2024, with a 200K token context length, known for strong reasoning and coding capabilities.
Claude-3.5-haiku: Anthropic's compact, fast model released in October 2024, with a 200K token context length, tailored for speed and cost-efficiency.
Claude-3.7-sonnet: Anthropic's latest hybrid reasoning model from early 2025, with a 200K token context length, featuring step-by-step problem-solving.
Imagen-3: Google's advanced text-to-image model, released in August 2024, focused on generating high-quality images from text prompts.
DALL-E: OpenAI's text-to-image model, with DALL-E 3 as the latest (October 2023), designed for creative image generation from detailed text descriptions.
